## Bio

I'm Robert DelRossi, a leader with a background in strategic planning, software development, 
and general business operations. I've has worked in financial services, retail software development, 
and in entertainment industries. My core ideology centers on deeply held beliefs in authenticity, 
transparency, excellence of execution and continuous improvement. 

Key among my business competencies are as team-builder, performance-developer,
communicator, and optimization-champion. As a technologist, my strengths include 
extensive knowledge of systems development processes, the development of sustainable
architectures, solution evangelization, and in leveraging the value of data to 
optimize business performance.

Outside of work, I'm a rabid baseball fan, cook, want-to-be musician, and amateur bartender.
